department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase one Wet High-Intensity Magnetic Separator (WHIMS) for Ottawa
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 5 January 2023 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Department of National Resources Canada (NRCan) has a requirement for the supply of one Wet High-Intensity Magnetic Separator (WHIMS), in Ottawa, Canada. Magnetic separation is a major unit process in processing the ores of the minerals containing critical commodities. Delivery to Ottawa, ON must be received before 31 March 2023. Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Request for Proposal. The period of the Contract is from date of Contract to one year after delivery and acceptance inclusive.
duration_in_months: It is expected that the contract will last for one year after delivery and acceptance inclusive.
full_summary:
# Tender for Wet High-Intensity Magnetic Separator

## Tender Details

| **Tender Title** | Wet High-Intensity Magnetic Separator |
| --- | --- |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS3741514924 |
| **Publication Date** | December 1, 2022 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | January 5, 2023, 14:00 EST |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | December 23, 2022 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | December 23, 2023 |

## Tender Status

* **Status**: Cancelled

## Contractual Details

* **Goods and Services Code (GSC)**: 41100000
* **UNSPSC Code** | *Laboratory and scientific equipment*

## Tender Description

The Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking the supply of a Wet High-Intensity Magnetic Separator (WHIMS) in Ottawa, Canada. Magnetic separation is a critical process in processing ores of minerals containing essential commodities. 

* **Delivery Location**: Ottawa, ON
* **Delivery Date**: Before March 31, 2023
* **Contract Period**: From the date of contract award to one year after delivery and acceptance.

Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements as outlined in the Request for Proposal. 

## Contact Information

If you have any questions, please contact:

* **Name**: Wijaya Putri
* **Title**: Yessica Karnali (Representative, SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Document Attachments and Tender Submission Requirements

Please disregard the posted deadline for supporting documentation and bidder submissions. The correct deadline is January 5, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

You can view the tender document at the following link: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14788756?extsite=MTQ3ODg3NTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Kind regards,

[Your Name]
